Author:
Michael Betancourt, Massachusetts Institute of Technology
Implementation of gaussian process regression using ROOT (http://root.cern.ch/drupal/) libraries for data I/O.

The CBLAS/LAPACK implementation in Apple's Accelerate framework is used for the heavy linear algebra work in order to fully take advantage of Apple hardware. Moving to a standard CBLAS/LAPACK implementation requires a few tweaks in gpClassifier::invert().

For more information on gaussian processes see http://www.guassianprocesses.org
